review_data.title: Good fondue
review_data.content: Had a very good fondue with an excellent Pinot Noir. quick and friendly service. This is a very small place but it is part of the character, a meal here is like being on the Alps for a couple of hours. Will visit again

review_data.title: Great Food
review_data.content: The Flammkuchen are spectacular and the service great. I visited the restaurant with my boyfriend and we both agreed on the fine quality of the dishes. Totally recommended.

review_data.title: Friendly casual meal

review_data.title: Flammkuchen

review_data.title: Mittagessen

review_data.title: Great place to try authentic fondue.

review_data.title: The food was fantastic.

review_data.title: The best Flammkuchen in Zurich

review_data.title: Easy going afternoon Imbiss
review_data.content: The food is excellent. Service excellent. Exactly what we were looking for on a sunny hot afternoon in Zurich. The FlammeKuchen Jardiniere was delicious and the salad crispy and colourful. Possibility to sit indoors as well as under a huge Parasol.

review_data.title: Weeknight Dinner

review_data.title: Flammkuchen Heaven
review_data.content: I think the Flammkuchen at "Zur Schtund" can definitely compete with the Flammkuchen in Elsass. I love this place and come here once a month. It`s cozy, the service is excellent and the Flammkuchen are a banger. Thank you!

review_data.title: Good as usual

review_data.title: Quaint little restaurant

review_data.title: Great local restaurant at the best hotel in town
review_data.content: I really love the hotel, the bar and its restaurants. The food is good, service is great and prices are very fair to be Zurich. Have a drink in the bar first!

review_data.title: The best flammkuchen

review_data.title: very small menu
review_data.content: Small restaurant, small menu and above average prices. If you're looking for a small snack and beer then go there but don't go there if you're looking for a real meal and finish the meal with a decent desert/coffee!

review_data.title: Tiny place with great atmosphere
